name: Project Tarvotan
description: Project Tarvotan allows you to explore the depths of the Milky Way and local universe. Use your wit and resources at hand to plan out your path through each sector. Your demise lurks around every decision. Can you survive long enough and restore balance to the universe?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10,Windows 8, Windows 7, Windows Vista Processor: Intel Pentium 4 Graphics: Integrated Graphics DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: Integrated Sound Card Additional Notes: Minimum Resolution - 1280x720
recommended_requirements: DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1 GB available space

reviews.review_text: I decided to give this game a try after getting bored of my other steam games. Although it is a very simple concept, it is effective. Having to manage everything at once kept my mind occupied. I was also very surprised about how nice the graphics were. The soundtrack was very good and the game is very well rounded. I would definetly recommend this game to others. The mix of strategy and deep thought made this game worth it.
